{
    a) = 0.656250
    b) = 0.406250
    c) = 0.906250
    d) = 1.718750
    e) = 3.937500
}
2-
{
    a) = 00000.10100000
    b) = 00001.00100000
    c) = 00001.00001000
    d) = 00011.11100000
    e) = 01011.01100000
}
3-
{
	a) = 0.131 (4)
    b) = 0.45 (8)
    c) = 0.98 (16)
    d) = 1.63 (8)
    e) = 0.1d (16)
}

{
	a = 0.111001
    b = 0.033013
    c = 0.111011100
    d = 13.011020

}
5-
{
    a)101.01 + 11,011 = 00001000,10100000
    b)1001.111 - 10,11 = 00000111,00100000
    c)100,011 * 11,01 = 00001100,11000000
    d)100,011 * 11,01 = 00001011,00000000
    e)100,011 * 11,01 = 110
}
